## ii() function

立即调用函数并返回其返回值。

注：`ii = immediately invoke`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ii<R, F extends () => R = () => R>(fn: F): R;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | F | 要调用的函数 |

<b>Returns:</b>

R

返回被调用函数的返回值

## Example


```typescript
ii(() => 1) // => 1

```
